long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove your reddit addiction through gradual reduction! 

This extension takes proven clinical methods of drug rehabilitation and applies it to reddit. Over a span of a few weeks, we gradually remove addicting features of reddit to train your psychology to like it less. 

Simply install and use reddit. Enjoy it while you can because you won't for long!

Created by:
Leo Kim (https://github.com/JongCleo)
Jonathan Zhao (https://github.com/jzhao293)
